class.name: TranslationServer
class.description: Server that manages all translations. Translations can be set to it and removed from it.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the server from all translations.

method.name: get_loaded_locales
method.description: Returns an array of all loaded locales of the project.

method.name: get_locale
method.description: Returns the current locale of the project. See also [method OS.get_locale] and [method OS.get_locale_language] to query the locale of the user system.

method.name: get_locale_name
method.description: Returns a locale's language and its variant (e.g. [code]"en_US"[/code] would return [code]"English (United States)"[/code]).

method.name: remove_translation
method.description: Removes the given translation from the server.

method.name: set_locale
method.description: Sets the locale of the project. The [code]locale[/code] string will be standardized to match known locales (e.g. [code]en-US[/code] would be matched to [code]en_US[/code]). If translations have been loaded beforehand for the new locale, they will be applied.

method.name: translate
method.description: Returns the current locale's translation for the given message (key).

method.name: translate_to
method.description: Returns the passed in locale's translation, or the current locale's translation if it can't be found for the given message (key).
